title: SMART x NASA airless, shape-shifting alloy tires bring Mars lander tech to road bikes
content:
Exactly…WTF?!? The Smart Tire Company has announced their new, aluminum alloy tire technology that’s based on the same research and designs as tires created for the Mars lander…and they’re for your bicycle. Co-founded by Survivor champ Earl Cole and blockchain engineer Brian Yennie, The SMART Tire Company teamed with NASA Glenn Research Center inventors Dr. […]

The post SMART x NASA airless, shape-shifting alloy tires bring Mars lander tech to road bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
